95561.<pc>は クロウズから\n竜笛を受け取った いきさつを話した。:
<pc> explained how they received
the dragon's flute from Claws.

95569.<pc>は オルゲンに\nこの里を訪れた目的を 話した。:
<pc> told Orgen the purpose of
their visit to the village.

95585.「……クロウズは 子供の頃からヤンチャでのう。\n あやつが遊びざかりの時に よ:
Claws has been mischevious since he was a
young boy. When he got the urge to play, I
would make toys for him.

95586.「不幸にも あの子は 幼くして\n 両親を はやり病で亡くしてな。\n それから:
Sadly, his parents died of a sudden illness
when he was still young. Since then, I raised
him on my own.

95587.「……そのクロウズが ある日\n 意を決したように 旅に出ると言いだしおった。\:
Then one day, Claws left to go on a journey by
himself. "I want to see what lies beyond
the Abyss Gate.", he said.

95588.「そこで 我らの同胞を見つけて 連れかえり\n この さびれゆく里を 盛り立てて:
He promised me that he'd find our people and
bring them here, to breathe some life back
into this dying village...

95589.「……のう <pc>よ。\n クロウズは 今 どこにいるんじゃろうか？:
Say, <pc>...do you happen
to know where Claws is now?

95590.<pc>は クロウズと\n最後に別れた時のことを 語った。:
<pc> recounted the last time they
saw and parted ways with Claws.

95591.「おぉ……そうか。 \n では あの子は 見事 奈落の門の向こうへ\n 行くこと:
Oh, I see... so that boy was able to go beyond
the Abyss Gate as he wanted...

95592.「なにしろ 生まれつき 向こう見ずで\n 無鉄砲なヤツだったからのう。\n どう:
After all, he's been reckless and foolhardy
for as long as I can remember. I was
quite worried about him.

95593.「だが いらぬ気苦労だったな。\n 竜化の術を身につけた 今のクロウズなら\n:
However, I worried for nothing. Now that Claws
has mastered dragonification, I'm sure he's
doing just fine in that other world.

95594.「そなた クロウズの変身を 見たことはあるか？\n 竜化の術……竜の姿への変化は:
Have you see him transform before? Dragonification, or the ability to transform into a dragon, isn't something that just any
Nadravian can learn.

95595.「あれを 成しとげるには 選ばれた才能と\n その上での厳しい修練が 必要となる:
One must be not only chosen, but also
endure rigorous training. Claws had to work
quite hard to achieve it.

95596.「……さて。待たせたのう <pc>。 \n さあ これが 竜の香炉じゃ。\n 受:
Anyways...sorry that I kept you. I've
finished the Dragon Incense. Please take it.

95598.「奈落の門は レンダーシアの中心……\n エテーネの島の上空に 隠されているはず:
The Abyss Gate is hidden in the heart of
Lendersia, above Ethene Island...
You should use the incense there.

95599.「もし クロウズと再会することがあったなら\n どうか あやつの助けになってくれ:
Also... if you do see Claws again, please
help him in any way you can.

95665.竜の香炉のチカラで 奈落の門が 姿を現した！<me 60>:
With the power of the Dragon Incense, the
Abyss Gate is revealed!<me 60>

95668.「アンテロ様……よくぞ ご無事で！: We're glad that you are safe!

101866.「やれやれ……ひどい音色じゃ……。\n こんな 竜笛が下手クソなヤツ\n この里:
Dear me, that tone is just terrible... I
didn't think anyone in this village could
play the flute so poorly...

101868.「よもや 竜族以外の者が\n この里に 入ってこようとは……。:
You've come to this village, but you're not
Nadravian... I don't believe it...

101869.「先ほど聞こえた 竜笛の音色は\n そなたのものだったようじゃが……:
I assume the flute that I heard just now
came from you...

101870.「竜笛の技術は 竜族だけに伝わるもの。\n ……そなた いったいどこで\n それ:
The art of playing that is passed down only
to Nadravians. Where in the world
did you learn it from?

101871.「……なるほど。そなたは クロウズの……\n わしの孫の 友人じゃったのか。\n:
I see... so you are a friend of Claws, my
grandson. I'm sorry for being so
apprehensive.

101872.「名前は……ふむ <pc>というのか。 \n わしは オルゲン。\n この隠れ里:
So your name is <pc>, is it?
I am Orgen, and I am chief of this village,
the Nadravian's Rest.

101873.「うむ そうじゃのう……。\n まずは なにゆえ この里を訪れたのか\n わしの:
Yes, well, anyways... would you be so kind
as to tell me why you've come here? We can
discuss at my home.

101874.「わしの家は 里でいちばん 高い場所にある。\n それでは 先に行って 待ってい:
It's located in the highest part of the
village. I'll go on ahead and wait for you.

102573.「おうおう よう来なすった。\n 今 お茶を出すから\n 遠慮なく かけてくれ。:
Oh, you've finally arrived. Please, take a
seat and make yourself comfortable. I'll get
some tea.

102574.「こうして ずっと隠れて暮らしていると\n 毎日 生活に 張り合いがなくてのう。:
Having lived in seclusion for so long, there really is no joy in daily life anymore. It's been years, decades even, since we last
had any outsiders visit us.

102575.「……しかし わざわざ こんな\n 年寄りばかりの へんぴな村まで\n そなた:
But, I must know...what brought you to this
secluded place? Us elderly folks who reside
here haven't much to offer...

102576.「な なんと……。 \n 竜族の男が あちこちで人を襲い\n 誘拐しているじゃと:
W-what did you say...? A Nadravian man is
attacking and kidnapping people from all
over...?!

102577.「バカな……クロウズを除けば\n 竜族は 今 この里にいる者だけじゃ。\n にわ:
Nonsense... Except for Claws, the only
Nadravians left are the ones still in this
place. It's difficult to believe your words...

102578.「……しかし そのようなウソをついたところで\n そなたに 得があるとも思えんな:
But...I don't think you have any reason to lie
to me. By any chance, is he...

102579.「……奈落の門の向こうから やってきた\n 竜族なのかも知れん。:
...a Nadravian who came from beyond the Abyss
Gate, perhaps...

102580.「奈落の門……その向こうは 神代の昔に\n アストルティアから 切りはなされた世:
Beyond the Abyss Gate is a world that was cut
off from Astoltia a long time ago. It's
said to be the home of the Nadravians.

102581.「……わしらは その門が閉ざされたときに\n こちらの世界に 取り残されてしまっ:
...and we are the descendants of the
Nadravians who were left behind here
after the gate was closed.

102582.「そういえば 先日 里の外に出ていた者が\n エテーネの島の上空に 巨大な門が浮:
That reminds me...just the other day, someone who ventured outside the village claimed a huge gate appeared over Ethene, only to
disappear shortly after.

102583.「それが 奈落の門だとするならば\n 門は消えたのではなく その場に存在したまま:
If that really was the Abyss Gate, then it is
still there. It's just invisible to the naked
eye.

102584.「……そう。この隠れ里に施されたものと同様の\n 竜族に伝わる幻術で 隠されてお:
Indeed. It is being concealed by the same kind
of illusion that hides this village.

102585.「その幻を生み出し 制御しているのが\n この里の中央にもある 竜の香炉という\:
These illusions are maintained by a special
device called Dragon Incense. It is located in
the center of the village.

102586.「そなたが その竜族の男を追うため\n 消えた奈落の門を 見つけだすつもりなら\:
If you intend to find the Abyss Gate in your
pursuit of that man, you will need that
incense.

102587.「この里のものを 貸すわけにはいかんが……\n １回きりのものでよければ 孫の友:
I can't lend you something our village needs...but for this special occasion, I can make one for you. You are a friend of my
grandson, after all.

102588.「そうじゃな……材料として 幻竜草と\n 竜の芯骨さえ 調達できれば\n あとは:
Right...if you can procure a Ghostlily and a
Dragon's Bone yourself, I can take care of the
rest.

102589.「竜の芯骨は ドラクロン山地へ行き\n 第１層の 中央の洞くつ内にいる\n スカ:
A Dragon's Bone can be obtained by going to
the Draklon Mountains and defeating a Skelegon
in the center cave of the first level.

102590.「ふたつとも集まったら わしの所まで来なされ。\n 竜の香炉を作り 奈落の門にか:
When you have gathered them both, I will make
the incense for you. That should break the
Abyss Gate's illusion.

103457.「……どうやら 見事 例の男に\n 打ち勝ったようじゃな。:
It seems that you've defeated that man
you were looking for.

103458.「なにやら イヤな予感がしてのう。\n そなたを心配して 来てみたが……。\n:
I had a bad feeling, so I came here to make
sure everything was okay, but... your face
tells me otherwise. What happened here?

103460.「……ふむ なるほどな。\n これは 奈落の門を開けるための\n カギの役割を果:
Hmmm, I see... it seems this seal serves as a
key to open the Abyss Gate.

103461.「むぅぅ……これはまた 難解な仕組みで\n できているのう……。\n この印は神:
Hmm, this also seems to be quite an intricate
mechanism... this mark from the age of the
gods... no, that's not... *mumble, mumble*

103462.「のう <cs_pchero>。\n そなた 仲間を助けるために\n 奈落の門の:
<cs_pchero>. You're planning on
going beyond the Abyss Gate to save your
friends, aren't you?<yesno><close>

103463.「いいや。隠す必要はないぞ。\n そなたの本音を 聞かせてくれればよい。:
There's no need to hide it. Please tell me
your true feelings.

103464.「うむ やはり そうであったか。\n ならば そなたに 語っておかねばなるまい。:
That's what I thought you'd say. In that case,
I must tell you something. Beyond that gate
lies the world of the Nadravians...

103465.「これは 古き竜族の技によって 作られた物。\n 他の種族の者には あつかえぬが:
This was made by ancient techniques of the
Nadravians. No other race can repair it, so
I should be able to do it for you.

103466.「気が急くじゃろうが しばしの辛抱じゃ。\n かならず 直してみせるから 待って:
I know you're in a hurry, but please just be
patient and trust me. I will fix it, I
promise! Now, if you'll excuse me!

105700.「待たせたな……私だ。: Sorry for the wait... it's me.

105701.「……予想外の妨害にあってな。\n 完全には 使命を果たせなかった。:
Due to some unexpected setbacks, I wasn't able
to fulfill the mission.

105702.「あの方には 合わせる顔もないが……\n まだ あきらめたわけではない。\n 引:
I'm not able to show my face to them, but I
haven't given up just yet. I will keep
searching for the remaining vessels.

105703.「せめて 今は このふたりだけでも\n あちらに 連れていってくれ。:
In the meantime, you can take those two over
there for now.

105706.「どうやって この門の幻術を\n 解いたかは知らぬが……:
I don't know how you managed to break this
illusion, but...

105707.「よかろう。これまでの失態を清算するためにも\n ここで 決着をつけてくれるわ。:
It matters not. It's time to settle the score
for what you did to me before.

105708.「あの方の加護を受けられる\n この場所でならば 存分に戦える……。\n 今こそ:
In this place, where I can receive his
blessing... I can fight at my full strength.
Let me show you my true power!

113848.「なんという……強さ……。\n 貴様……ただの<cs_pchero_race>で:
What... strength... you're no... ordinary
<cs_pchero_race>, are you... However...!

113849.「門の向こうは 我ら 竜族の領域……\n 貴様に 行かせはせぬっ！！:
Beyond this gate lies the domain of my people,
the Nadravians! I will not let you pass!

115150.「たゆたう炎よ…… この世界の行く末を\n 我らの待望する かの者の到来せし未来:
O flickering flame... Show us now the future
of this world we long for, and the arrival of
the one that we await.

115151.「……間もなくじゃ。\n もう間もなく 約束されし解放者が\n このナドラガンド:
Soon... soon the promised liberator will
appear here in the land of Nadragand.

115152.「……失礼します 総主教さま。\n 間もなく 礼拝が始まる時間ですが……。:
Excuse me, Patriarch... It's almost time for
the service to begin...

115153.「我らが神よ。その日まで……\n どうか 竜族の民を お守りくだされ。:
To our god... until that day comes, please
protect all of dragonkind.

116746.「幻竜草は この隠れ里の中心にある\n 竜の香炉の辺りに 生えておるはずじゃ。\:
Ghostlily should be growing around the Dragon
Incense in the center of the village. Be sure
to search thoroughly.

117159.「クロウズが竜笛を 託したのなら\n そなたは 信頼に足る人物なのじゃろう。\n:
If Claws gave you his flute, then he must
trust you greatly. I will gladly welcome you
as a guest in this village.

117160.「それが クロウズの友人で\n しかも 竜族以外の種族とはな……\n 長生きはし:
That's a friend of Claws, and not even
Nadravian, no less... having a long life does
have its benefits.

117161.「クロウズが 里を出て行ってからというもの\n となりにある あやつの部屋も が:
Ever since Claws left, his room has been
empty, and things have been a bit lonely.

117162.「あのヤンチャ坊主が 竜化の術を会得した日……\n わしは その姿を しっかりと:
The day that mischevious boy mastered it...
That image will forever be burned into my
mind. I'll never forget it...

117163.アンテロが倒れたあとに 粉々に砕かれた\n破片が 散らばっている。:
After Antelo fell, the fragments were
shattered to pieces and scattered about.

117876.「おお……これが 奈落の門か。\n なんと巨大で 荘厳な造りじゃ。:
Ohh... so this is the Abyss Gate. How majestic
it truly is...

117879.「ナドラガンドは アストルティアより隔絶され\n 長きに渡り いっさいの交流が途:
Separated from Astoltia, Nadragand is an
unknown world. They have not made any contact
in quite a long time...

117880.「我らの常識では 計り知れぬ場所じゃ。\n そして そこへ旅立つ者には\n あま:
It is an unfathomable place. Those who travel
there will have to endure many hardships...

117881.「それでも 行くと言うなら……\n <cs_pchero>よ。ひとまず コイツは:
But if you really still insist on going...
I'll take care of this for the time being.

117882.「まあ まかせておけ。仲間を助けたいと願い\n 苦難に立ち向かわんとする そなた:
Just leave it to me. I have a sudden urge to
support the hardships that have yet to come
so you can help your friends.

119051.「また来たか <cs_pchero>。\n おろかなヤツめ……。: You, again? You are a fool...

119052.「何度挑もうが 同じこと。\n ここが 貴様の墓場となるのだ。:
Give up, your resistance is futile. This place
will be your graveyard.

119053.「我らの野望は ついえぬ……。\n 今ふたたび 我が真の実力を 思い知るがいい！:
My ambitions remain unfulfilled and now you
will once again see the true strength of a
Nadravian!

119054.「ふん……。\n この程度で 勝ったつもりか？\n 下等種族の分際で 片腹痛いわ:
Hmph...you really think you've won?
How utterly laughable, coming from such
an inferior race!

119055.「……お前たちは 先に行け。\n ネズミが まぎれこむ前に 門を閉じよ。:
You two, go on ahead. Close that gate before
these mice get in.

119056.「教えてやろう <cs_pchero>……。\n 選ばれし民 竜族の 絶対的な強:
Let me show you! The absolute strength of the
Nadravians, they who have been chosen!

119058.「貴様を 門の向こうに行かせるわけにはいかぬ！\n 我らを邪魔立てした その罪科:
I will not let you enter this gate! You shall
atone for your crime of meddling by my
fangs and claws!

119098.竜の香炉は 音もなく くずれさった。: The Dragon Incense disintegrated into nothing.

119979.<cs_pchero>は ここで起こった出来事を\nオルゲンに説明した。:
<cs_pchero> explained to Orgen
everything that had happened here.

119980.「……なんと。男は倒したが\n 仲間は 奈落の門の向こうへ\n 連れ去られてしま:
Oh, dear... you defeated that man, but your
friends were still taken beyond the Abyss
Gate? Hmmm...
